sentences: Ta ei suutnud päästa oma kuningat mattist.
context: In Estonian, 'päästa' means to save or rescue someone/something from danger, harm, or an undesirable situation. In chess context specifically, it refers to a player trying to save their king from checkmate (matti). The word can be used in various contexts - saving people from physical danger, rescuing objects from damage, avoiding defeat in games, or escaping difficult situations.
